name: Google
opening_messages: Hello! Let's dive into the world of Google.
Brace yourself, we're entering Google territory.
Get ready for a Google adventure!

name: Facebook
opening_messages: Welcome to Facebook! Stay connected with friends and family.
Time to socialize on Facebook!
Let's explore the Facebook world together.

name: Twitter
opening_messages: Tweet, retweet, and discover on Twitter.
The world of tweets and trends awaits you.
Get ready to share your thoughts on Twitter.

name: LinkedIn
opening_messages: Step into the professional world of LinkedIn.
Connect, network, and grow on LinkedIn.
Welcome to LinkedIn, where opportunities await.

name: GitHub
opening_messages: Explore the world of coding and collaboration on GitHub.
Get ready to commit and push on GitHub.
Welcome to GitHub, where code comes to life.

name: archive
opening_messages: Unlock the treasure trove of historical content on the Internet Archive.
Journey into the past with the Internet Archive.
Explore history and culture on the Internet Archive.

name: movies
opening_messages: Lights, camera, action! Enjoy movies on Vega Movies.
Welcome to Vega Movies, your source for entertainment.
Get ready for a movie marathon on Vega Movies.

name: dead toons
opening_messages: Enter the world of cartoons and anime on Dead Toons.
Get ready to watch your favorite toons on Dead Toons.
Welcome to Dead Toons, where animations come to life.

name: music
opening_messages: Get your groove on with music from PagalWorld.
Time to enjoy music on PagalWorld!
Welcome to PagalWorld, your destination for music.
